aboutHeader.title: Vector Database for Enterprise-grade AI
aboutHeader.subTitle: We help organizations create AI/ML applications stunningly easy and fast, no matter their size.

companyInfo.title: The leading provider of vector database and AI technologies.
companyInfo.desc1: We are the engineers and scientists who created LF AI Milvus®, the world's most popular open-source vector database.
companyInfo.desc2: By taking the burden of complex data infrastructure management off our users, we are committed to bringing the power of AI to every corporation, every organization and every individual.

investorInfo.title: Our investors
investorInfo.subTitle: We’re lucky to be joined on this journey by some of the best investors.

partnersInfo.title: Our partners
partnersInfo.subTitle: Trusted by top-tier product companies. We are committed to bringing the power of AI to every corporation, every organization and every individual.
